casos.title: Success Cases in MERCOSUR
casos.subtitle: Leading organizations relied on our demographic projections to optimize strategic decisions, anticipate scenarios, and improve large-scale planning.
casos.c1_text: Brazil required consistent projections to plan urban infrastructure works. Our models allowed the identification of demographic pressure zones and investment prioritization.
casos.c2_text: YPF used our simulator to identify logistic corridors with accelerated growth. Demographic projections enabled planning of new strategic fuel stations.
casos.c3_text: Udelar used age-range projections to estimate future enrollment, enabling the planning of new facilities, priority programs, and campus distribution.
casos.c4_text: The Ministry needed a system integrating MERCOSUR regional indicators. Our tools enabled comparative modeling and improved policy allocation.
casos.c5_text: This regional retailer used our projections to determine where to open new stores in Argentina, Brazil, and Uruguay based on demographic trends.
